ctx: intros aP R Q HOBuch a HinQ.
exceptions.tactic: apply (ObuchPred aP R Q HOBuch a HinQ).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) aP, R, Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) HOBuch : OBuch aP Q R a : poly A0 eqA ltM HinQ : In a Q The term "HinQ" has type "In a Q" while it is expected to have type "In a aP".

original: intros aP R Q HOBuch a HinQ. apply (ObuchPred aP R Q HOBuch a HinQ).
